scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:ml"
scripts.dev:ml: cd ml-service && . venv/bin/activate && python -m uvicorn main:app --reload --port 8000
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:api
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../api && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules api/node_modules frontend/.next api/dist
scripts.type-check: cd frontend && npm run type-check && cd ../api && npm run build
